alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 21 at 11:26PM MST until December 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet possible, with locally higher totals. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph could result in areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Western Uinta Mountains and Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of heaviest snowfall is expected Thursday evening through Friday morning, and could impact peak holiday travel times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains
